name: sitegenesisdata
description: This is a repository for the data that goes with the mobile first version of SiteGenesis.

scripts.zipData: if [ -f demo_data_no_hires_images.zip ] ; then rm -r demo_data_no_hires_images.zip && zip -r demo_data_no_hires_images.zip demo_data_no_hires_images ; else zip -r demo_data_no_hires_images.zip demo_data_no_hires_images ; fi
